sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no character named Kayla. The "[[Meereenese Knot]]" is an inside joke to the books fandom about a major plot issue [[George R. R. Martin]] had to deal with when writing ''A Dance With Dragons''.
sections.Behind the Scenes:
[[Image:Kayla full contortion.jpg|thumb|Kayla, played by contortionist Pixie Le Knot]]
The actress who plays Kayla, Pixie Le Knot, is a professional contortionist.

{{Quote|Kayla is famous here to [[Volantis]]... in certain circles. One of four women in the world who can perform a proper Meereenese Knot.|Tyrion Lannister|Walk of Punishment}}
'''Kayla''' is a recurring character in the [[Season 3|third]] and [[Season 4|fourth]] seasons. She is portrayed by contortionist [[Pixie Le Knot]]. Kayla is a [[Prostitution|prostitute]] in the [[King's Landing]] brothel owned by [[Petyr Baelish|Petyr "Littlefinger" Baelish]].
